identity.title: Repeating the Last Character of a String

content.prompt: Given a string variable str, complete the following code in order to create a string that has the last character of the string str repeated 2 times.  Store the resulting string in a variable called output.Assume that the initial value of variable str is already set to a string with zero or more characters.E.g. 1: if the value of str is "Hello", the code prints oo. E.g. 2: if the value of str is "HiH", the code prints HH.
content.source_code:
[file SCode.java]
[blocked]
    String output;
[/blocked]
[student_code]
    // TODO: add your code here
    
    
[/student_code]
[blocked]
    System.out.println(output);
[/blocked]
[/file]
